title: The Man from Earth: Holocene
occurrences: Hi, my name is Richard Schenkman, and I directed "Jerome Bixby's The Man from Earth",
as well as the movie you're about to watch, "The Man from Earth: Holocene".
Thank you again for your support, and I hope you enjoy "The Man from Earth: Holocene".
We even live in the same geological epoch as them: the Holocene.
"The Longest Night: My Conversation with the Man From Earth"...
- 'Holocene Man'. - Your dates are a little off.
- The Holocene only goes back twelve thousand years. And you, you're... - (I know.)
Yeah, well, the scientific community is starting to coalesce around the idea that the Holocene's over.
